name: Lamora
description:
Demo (Prologue & Chapter 1): You're assigned to a mission. Can you handle it?

Genres: Supernatural, mystery, romance

Content warning: The general stuff it might involve; Violence, abuse, cursing, death, murder, sex, alcohol, smoking & body horror.

Age Rating: 18+

Lamora: Deceit and Destruction is an interactive fiction novel where you play as a Hunting Agent who’s assigned to a town called Lamora. Filled with shady characters, a series of unexplainable events and with zero knowledge of what’s happening, who do you decide to trust when your life is on the line?

PLOT SUMMARY

You are a special rank officer from the Agency of Control- a government organization tasked with the control, capture or extermination of supernatural creatures that pose a threat to the majority of the population- assigned to investigated the multiple reports regarding a small town called Lamora.

You head to the town with your partner, a bright and bubbly person who’s been with you since your first day in the agency. Though there are a dozen reports of murdered/missing persons cases, when you arrive at the town, seemingly none of them know what you’re talking about.

FEATURES

  • A customizable MC;
  • Select your gender, pronouns, appearance, personality.
  • Romance 4 different characters: 1 male, 1 female, 1 non-binary & 1 gender selectable.
  • Explore Lamora and its secrets and in turn find the truth to your existence.

ROMANTIC INTERESTS

  • Allen/Althea Tarrin (M/F|He/Him|She/Her): Your partner. A special-rank officer whose teasing and childish demeanor hides the skillful and dangerous agent underneath.
  • Matteo Hiron (M|He/Him): A convenience store owner. A flirtatious man with a knack of escaping any and all topics about himself.
  • Korina Fedir (F|She/Her): A mechanic. A woman with a friendly persona and skilled hands, who’s equally skilled at keeping her history a secret.
  • Mikael Dansei (NB| He/Him): A bartender. Cold and snappy who’s skills in bartending make a great way to avoid any conversation.
